title: Gas chromatography-stable isotope ratio mass spectrometry prior solid phase microextraction and gas chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry: development and optimization of analytical methods to analyse garlic (Allium sativum L.) volatile fraction
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9
